content: As with all Drinks in the game, the potency of this can be increased by finding the Awoken Wine Worm locations around the game's areas. Our wiki page has all of their locations for you.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Worryfree_Brew.md', within the main section titled 'Worryfree Brew'.
The content is as follows:
As with all Drinks in the game, the potency of this can be increased by finding the Awoken Wine Worm locations around the game's areas. Our wiki page has all of their locations for you.
